name: Wikipedia - Dark Theme
description:
PLEASE CHECK OUT https://www.queengoob.org/darkthemes FOR FUTURE UPDATES.  I AM NO LONGER MAINTAINING STYLES ON USERSTYLES.ORG.  ALL OF MY STYLES WILL BE MAINTAINED ON GITHUB AND USERSTYLES.WORLD INSTEAD.

A dark theme for Wikipedia/Wikimedia.  Colors are adjustable via the variables set on :root.

Any issues?  Code changes you'd like to submit?  Additional websites to add?  Want to check out my other dark theme styles?  Let me know by contacting me through my social media (and please provide a screenshot if possible): https://www.queengoob.org/darkthemes
